issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding public healthcare options and reducing out-of-pocket medical costs

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased public school funding and teacher salary increases

issues.title: Climate Change Mitigation
issues.description: Supports renewable energy investments and carbon reduction policies

issues.title: Minimum Wage Increase
issues.description: Supports gradual minimum wage increase to $15 per hour

issues.title: Immigration Reform
